name: UFO: Covert Milking
description:
This project was submitted as a 2-day Unity game jam "Create with Code Live Game Jam" on October 25, 2020. 

In this arcade style game, the player controls a UFO from an isometric perspective. The objective is to collect cows that spawn in the field, but this has a chance to leave behind evidence files in which agents will appear and then run to collect those files. Collect the cows and collect evidence before agents do. 

The aliens have an insatiable appetite for milk to dip their cookies in!
